original: tathā ca yathā ekasyaiva sataḥ kṛṣṇasya vedavyāsasya vyāsatvaṃ nirviśeṣitavyāsapadavācyatvamastītyarthaḥ /
analyzed: tathā ca yathā ekasya eva sataḥ kṛṣṇasya vedavyāsasya vyāsa tvam nirviśeṣita vyāsa pada vācya tvam asti iti arthaḥ
tathā ca niḥ viśeṣita tvāt mukhya sūtra tvam brahmasūtrāṇām iti vākyaśeṣaḥ

original: idānīṃ ye amukhyāḥ na te nirviśeṣapadavācyāḥ kintu saviśeṣapadavācyāḥ iti vyatirekavyāptimabhipretya tatra dṛṣṭāntamāha - 'anye'; iti /
analyzed: idānīm ye amukhyāḥ na te nirviśeṣa pada vācyāḥ kintu saviśeṣa pada vācyāḥ iti vyatireka vyāptim abhipretya tatra dṛṣṭāntam āha anye iti
yathā iti anuvartate
pūrvam eka śabda śravaṇāt atra amukhyāḥ iti labhyate
vyāsāḥ iti śeṣaḥ
tathā ca yathā kṛṣṇāt anye
drauṇya ādayaḥ ye mukhyāḥ te viśeṣaṇāt
eva viśeṣaṇam apekṣya eva vyāsāḥ na tad nairapekṣyeṇa
tṛtīyā arthe vā pañcamī
sa viśeṣaṇa vyāsa pada vācyāḥ eva iti yojanā
sa viśeṣaṇa sūtrāṇi hi aparāṇi vidaḥ viduḥ
nanu astu brahmasūtrāṇām mukhya tvam
tathā api tad anyeṣām api asti
na teṣām eva
itareṣām amukhya tve kāraṇa abhāvāt iti āśaṅkya
tatra niḥ viśeṣita tva hetoḥ sama vyāpti pareṇa tad artham eva prāgukta vyatireka vyāpti dṛṣṭānta vacanena upapādita anvaya vyāptikam anumānam niyāmaka tvena āha
sa viśeṣaṇaḥ iti
atas iti anuvartate
aparāṇi iti ca āvartate
hi śabdaḥ hetvarthe
tathā ca yatas aparāṇi
brahmasūtrebhyaḥ nyāni sūtrāṇi aparāṇi
amukhyāni atas eva vidaḥ
jñāninaḥ aparāṇi
sa viśeṣaṇa sūtrāṇi
viśeṣaṇa sahita sūtra pada vācyāni iti viduḥ
upajānanti iti arthaḥ
tathā ca anya sūtrāṇām sa viśeṣaṇa sūtra tvāt amukhya tvam eva
na mukhya tvam iti bhāvaḥ
mukhyasya nirviśeṣeṇa śabdaḥ nyeṣām viśeṣataḥ
niḥ viśeṣita tva mukhya tvayoḥ sa viśeṣaṇa tva amukhya tvayoḥ ca dṛṣṭānta mukhena upapāditām vyāptim
dṛṣṭānte mukhya tva amukhya tvayoḥ veda vibhāga grantha vistara kartṛ tva tad sādṛśya ādi rūpa anya kāraṇa prayojya tva sambhavāt asiddhā
vyāptiḥ iti āśaṅkā parihārāya pramāṇena sādhayati mukhyasya iti
sa avadhāraṇam etat
evam anyeṣām iti api
tena mukhya tva amukhya tvayoḥ vyāpaka tā siddhiḥ
vācaka tvam ṣaṣṭhī arthaḥ
tathā ca yatas mukhyasya eva nirviśeṣeṇa
viśeṣaṇa abhāvena vācaka śabdaḥ sti
niḥ viśeṣita śabda vācya tvam asti iti yāvat
anyeṣām amukhyānām eva viśeṣataḥ
viśeṣaṇam apekṣya
viśeṣaṇena iti vā
śabdaḥ vācakaḥ
iti veda vidaḥ prāhuḥ śabda tattva artha vedinaḥ
iti evam prakāreṇa śabda tattva artha vedinaḥ
śabdasya yathā bhūta artha jñāninaḥ veda vidaḥ
veda artha jñāḥ vṛddhāḥ prāhuḥ
vadanti iti arthaḥ
asya atas yeṣām sūtra tvam añjasā
sa viśeṣaṇa sūtrāṇi aparāṇi amukhyāni
iti uktam yuktam iti vākyaśeṣeṇa anvayaḥ
viśeṣitaḥ iti kvacid pāṭhaḥ
viśeṣaṇam prāptaḥ iti tasya arthaḥ

original: tathā ca mukhyāmukhyayornirviśeṣaṇasaviśeṣaṇaśabdavācyatve vedo vṛddhavyavahāraśca pramāṇamityuktatvānna tayoḥ kāraṇāntaraṃ śaṅkyamiti bhāvaḥ
analyzed: tathā ca mukhya amukhyayoḥ nirviśeṣaṇa saviśeṣaṇa śabda vācya tve vedaḥ vṛddha vyavahāraḥ ca pramāṇam iti ukta tvāt na tayoḥ kāraṇa antaram śaṅkyam iti bhāvaḥ
sūtreṣu yeṣu sarve nirṇayāḥ samudīritāḥ
astu etat sūtra tvam añjasā brahmasūtrāṇām

original: tathāpi vedārthanirṇayasya sūtrāntaraireva sambhavāt kiṃ brahmasūtrairiti codyasya kathaṃ 'yeṣām';
analyzed: tathā api veda artha nirṇayasya sūtra antaraiḥ eva sambhavāt kim brahmasūtraiḥ iti codyasya katham yeṣām

original: ityanena parihāra ukta ityatastadvākyoktaṃ vivṛṇoti - 'sūtreṣu'; iti /
analyzed: iti anena parihāraḥ uktaḥ iti atas tad vākya uktam vivṛṇoti sūtreṣu iti
nimitta saptamī iyam

original: nirṇayasya sarvatvaṃ viṣayadvārā tasya ca śabdadvārā bodhyam /
analyzed: nirṇayasya sarva tvam viṣaya dvārā tasya ca śabda dvārā bodhyam

original: tathā ca yebhyaḥ sūtrebhyaḥ sarve nirṇayāḥ sarvaśākhārthanirṇayāḥ bhāvyatayā samudīritāḥ,
analyzed: tathā ca yebhyaḥ sūtrebhyaḥ sarve nirṇayāḥ sarva śākhā artha nirṇayāḥ bhāvya tayā samudīritāḥ
yeṣām sarva śākhā nirṇāyaka tvam uktam
pramāṇe iti arthaḥ
yat vā nirṇīyante iti nirṇayāḥ nirṇetavya arthāḥ
ayam bhāvaḥ yeṣām
iti vākye tāvat brahmasūtrāṇām eva añjasā sūtra tvam iti uktam

original: sati caivaṃ tadantargataṃ sūtradharmatayoktaṃ viśvatoṇukhatvamapi teṣāmevāñjasā bhavati /
analyzed: sati ca evam tat antargatam sūtra dharma tayā uktam viśvatoṇu kha tvam api teṣām eva añjasā bhavati
yadā ca evam tadā teṣām asaṅkucita sarva śākhā nirṇāyaka tvam uktam bhavet
katipaya śākhā nirṇāyaka tve āñjasya anupapatteḥ

original: yata evamataḥ sarvavedaśākhārthanirṇāyakānāṃ brahmasūtrāṇām asarvanirṇāyakebhyo 'nyasūtrebhyo 'tiśayena nirṇāyakatvāt yuktaṃ 'tasyārthavittaye  #
analyzed: yatas evam atas sarva veda śākhā artha nirṇāyakānām brahmasūtrāṇām a sarva nirṇāyakebhyaḥ nya sūtrebhyaḥ tiśayena nirṇāyaka tvāt yuktam tasya artha vittaye
brahmasūtrāṇi cakāra iti

original: tacchabdaghaṭitaṃ tadvacanaṃ tādarthyena sūtrakaraṇavacanamiti bhavati tena śaṅkāparihāra iti / @----------
analyzed: tad śabda ghaṭitam tat vacanam tādarthyena sūtra karaṇa vacanam iti bhavati tena śaṅkā parihāraḥ iti
śabda jātasya sarvasya yad pramāṇaḥ ca nirṇayaḥ
anyeṣām api dvitra śākhā nirṇāyaka tvāt katham eteṣām eva sarva śākhā nirṇāyaka tvam iti ucyate
anyathā tad vaiyarthya prasaṅgāt

original: tathā ca aṃśe gatārthatetyāśaṅkāparihārāyāñjasyoktyā sūcitamanyaccāha - 'śabdajātasya'; iti/
analyzed: tathā ca aṃśe gatārtha tā iti āśaṅkā parihārāya añjasyā uktyā sūcitam anyat ca āha śabda jātasya iti
pūrva mīmāṃsā ādi rūpasya iti arthaḥ

original: ata evoktaṃ sudhāyām “etanmīmāṃsopajīvinī khalu seti purāṇe paṭhyate śabdajātasyeti“iti /
analyzed: atas eva uktam sudhāyām etad mīmāṃsā upajīvinī khalu sā iti purāṇe paṭhyate śabda jātasya iti iti
kartari ṣaṣṭhī iyam na karmaṇi
atas eva ṭīkāyām śabda samūhaiḥ iti tṛtīyā
kartṛ tvam ca karaṇībhūta veda iti kartavya tayā
itikartavya tvam ca mīmāṃsā dvārā upakāraka tvāt bhavati
śabda jāta padam śabda pramāṇa mātra param iti āśayena sambandha ṣaṣṭhī iyam
sambandhaḥ ca janya janaka bhāvaḥ iti kecid
yat pramāṇam mūlam yasya sa tathā uktaḥ
ca śabdaḥ samuccaye
samudāhṛtaḥ
iti asya anukarṣakaḥ ca
iti śabdaḥ dhyāhāryaḥ
tathā ca anyeṣām dvitra śākhā nirṇāyaka tve pi bhavati eva brahmasūtrāṇām eva ananya apekṣā saṅkucita sarva śākhā nirṇāyaka tvam
anya kartṛka dvitra śākhā artha nirṇayasya brahmasūtra mūla tvena tad janya nirṇaya upajīvi tvena anyeṣām śruti vyākhyāna rūpa tvāt

original: yathā śrutimūlakasmṛteravaiyarthyaṃ tadvadavaiyarthyopapattermūlena mūlino vaiyarthyābhāvāditi bhāvaḥ / @----------
analyzed: yathā śruti mūlaka smṛteḥ avaiyarthyam tadvat avaiyarthya upapatteḥ mūlena mūlinaḥ vaiyarthya abhāvāt iti bhāvaḥ
evaṃvidhāni sūtrāṇi kṛtvā vyāsaḥ mahā yaśāḥ
evaṃvidhāni iti
añjasā viśvatomukha tva ādi upetāni iti arthaḥ
asya upasaṃhāra rūpa tvāt na tāni cakāra
iti anena punaruktiḥ
brahma rudra ādi deveṣu manuṣya pitṛ pakṣiṣu
deveṣu iti anena karma ja ajāna ja deva deva gandharvāḥ api saṅgṛhītāḥ
manuṣya padam nivītam sam
ityādau iva manana śīla ṛṣi param
pānti iti pāḥ cakravartinaḥ
kṣī iti kṣaya arthasya kṣeḥ rūpam manuṣya uttama vācakam
teṣām itara apekṣayā ati alpa āyuḥ tvāt
manuṣya gandharvāṇām api upalakṣakam etat
manuṣyāḥ ca pitaraḥ ca pāḥ ca kṣayaḥ ca iti vigrahaḥ
anena deva ṛṣi pitṛ panarāḥ

original: ityuktāḥ pañcavidhā api muktiyogyāḥ saṅgṛhītā bhavanti /
analyzed: iti uktāḥ pañcavidhāḥ api mukti yogyāḥ saṅgṛhītāḥ bhavanti
pakṣī iti asya akhaṇḍa tve pakṣi śabdaḥ jaritāri ādi yogya tiryak paraḥ

original: jñānaṃ saṃsthāpya bhagavān krīḍate puruṣottamaḥ / ityādi /
analyzed: jñānam saṃsthāpya bhagavān krīḍate puruṣottamaḥ ityādi
jñānam samyak jñānam viśeṣa jñānam saṃsthāpya
utpādya dṛḍhīkṛtvā iti vā
dṛḍhīkaraṇam nāma jñāna viṣaye saṃśaya viparyaya nirāsaḥ

original: tathā ca puruṣottamo mahāyaśāḥ uttamaśloko bhagavān vyāso yeṣu sūtreṣu sarve nirṇayāḥ samudīritāḥ,
analyzed: tathā ca puruṣottamaḥ mahā yaśāḥ uttamaślokaḥ bhagavān vyāsaḥ yeṣu sūtreṣu sarve nirṇayāḥ samudīritāḥ
yeṣām sarva śākhā nirṇāyaka tvam uktam
tathā sarvaiḥ śabda samūhaiḥ jaimini ādi sūtra antara ātmakaiḥ nirṇāyakaiḥ smṛti ādibhiḥ ca
kriyamāṇaḥ loka kartṛka veda eka deśa avāntara tā tāparya nirṇayaḥ yad mūlakaḥ yad janya sarva veda mahā tātparya nirṇaya mūlakaḥ

original: tadupajīvī - taṃ vinā avāntaratātparyajñānamātreṇa muktiphalāsiddheriti coktaṃ 'yeṣāṃ';
analyzed: tad upajīvī tam vinā avāntara tātparya jñāna mātreṇa mukti phala asiddheḥ iti ca uktam yeṣām

original: iti pūrvavākye pramāṇe ca - evaṃvidhāni etādṛkprakārāṇi sūtrāṇi kṛtvā brahmarudrādideveṣu manuṣyapitṛpakṣiṣu jñānaṃ saṃsthāpya krīḍata iti
analyzed: iti pūrva vākye pramāṇe ca evaṃvidhāni etādṛś prakārāṇi sūtrāṇi kṛtvā brahma rudra ādi deveṣu manuṣya pitṛ pakṣiṣu jñānam saṃsthāpya krīḍate iti
krīḍate parameśvaraḥ

original: iti pāṭhe aiśvaryam evaṃvidhasūtrakaraṇe asāmarthyaśaṅkānirāsakatayoktamiti dhyeyam /
analyzed: iti pāṭhe aiśvaryam evaṃvidha sūtra karaṇe asāmarthya śaṅkā nirāsaka tayā uktam iti dhyeyam

original: atra brahmādiṣu jñānasaṃsthāpanaṃ nāma pūrvaṃ sthitasyaiva jñānasya viśeṣayuktyādibhiḥ dṛḍhīkaraṇaṃ kiñcidaprāptalābhaścocyate1,
analyzed: atra brahma ādiṣu jñāna saṃsthāpanam nāma pūrvam sthitasya eva jñānasya viśeṣa yukti ādibhiḥ dṛḍhīkaraṇam
jānantaḥ pi viśeṣa artha jñānāya sthāpanāya vā
iti gītā tātparya udāhṛta vacanāt

original: na ca 'evaṃ jñānaṃ punaḥ prāpurdevāśca ṛṣayastathā';
analyzed: na ca evam jñānam punar prāpuḥ devāḥ ca ṛṣayaḥ tathā
iti bhārata tātparya niraṇaya virodhaḥ
atra punar śabdāt sarva deva ādīnām ajñāta vismṛta artha jñāna prāpteḥ ukta tvāt iti vācyam
tasya api ukta ārtha tvāt
viriñca itareṣām tirohita artha jñāna lābhaḥ vā atrā ucyate
yatas āhuḥ gītā tātparye ācāryāḥ brahmaṇaḥ tu prāyas na apratibhāsitam iti
ityādi iti asya tat ca uktam
iti anena anvayaḥ
lupta vibhaktikaḥ yam nirdeśaḥ
atha atas brahma jijñāsā
jīvasya ca sva prakāśa tvena asandigdha tvāt

original: tathā ca viṣayābhāvāt pratyagrūpe brahmaṇyahamiti pratīyamāne 'pi mokṣānuphalambhena
analyzed: tathā ca viṣaya abhāvāt pratyagrūpe brahmaṇi aham iti pratīyamāne mokṣa anuphalambhena

original: prayojanābhāvāt tata eva tatpratibaddhādhikāryabhāvācca na brahmajijñāsā kartavyeti
analyzed: prayojana abhāvāt tatas eva tad pratibaddha adhikāri abhāvāt ca na brahma jijñāsā kartavyā iti
prāpte siddhāntitam bhagavatā sūtrakāreṇa om
atha atas brahma jijñāsā
om iti
idam ekam sūtram ekam adhikaraṇam
adhikaraṇam nāma viṣaya saṃśaya pūrvapakṣa siddhānta prayojana rūpa pañcāṅga samudāyaḥ

original: yathātraiva jijñāsādhikaraṇe “tadvijijñāsasva“iti jijñāsābhidhāyakavākyavihitā śravaṇādirūpā jijñāsā viṣayaḥ /
analyzed: yathā atra eva jijñāsā adhikaraṇe tat vijijñāsasva eti jijñāsā abhidhāyaka vākya vihitā śravaṇa ādi rūpā jijñāsā viṣayaḥ
kartavyā na vā iti sandehaḥ
na kartavyā iti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ
asmin pakṣe ca śāstrasya anārambhaṇīya tva niścayaḥ phalam
kartavyā iti siddhāntaḥ
tatra ca ārambhaṇīya tva nirṇayaḥ phalam
evam anyatra api
ekasya adhikaraṇasya saṅgati pañcakam
tat ca śāstra saṅgatiḥ
adhyāya saṅgatiḥ
pāda saṅgatiḥ
tad viṣaya vākya saṅgatiḥ ca iti evaṃrūpam
saṅgatiḥ api sāmānyatas dvividhā
antarbhāva rūpā ānantarya lakṣaṇā ca iti
tatra śāstra adhyāya pādaiḥ antarbhāva rūpā saṅgatiḥ

original: sāpi ākṣepikī ātideśikī aupodghātikī āpavādikī prāsaṅgikī ityādirūpeṇa bahuvidhā /
analyzed: sā api ākṣepikī ātideśikī aupodghātikī āpavādikī prāsaṅgikī iti ādi rūpeṇa bahuvidhā
tatra pañca adhikaraṇī paryantam śāstra saṅgati mātram
na adhyāya pāda saṅgatī
samanvaya īkṣatyoḥ adhyāyena saṅgati satve pi pādena abhāvāt saṅgatyoḥ abhāvaḥ pañca adhikaraṇī sādhāraṇaḥ
tathā pūrva adhikaraṇa tad viṣaya saṅgatī api na etad adhikaraṇasya bhavataḥ
asya eva ādya adhikaraṇa tvāt śruti vicārasya adya api anārabdha tvāt ca
kintu itareṣām caturṇām iti dhyeyam

original: atra sūtre ādyantayoroṅkāraḥ uccāraṇīyaḥ tatrādya eka eva dṛṣṭādṛṣṭobhayārthaḥ ata eva sūtrāvayavaḥ sarvasūtreṣu anuvṛttyarthamasaṃhitatayoccāryate
analyzed: atra sūtre ādi antayoḥ oṅkāraḥ uccāraṇīyaḥ tatra ādyaḥ ekaḥ eva dṛṣṭa adṛṣṭa ubhaya arthaḥ atas eva sūtra avayavaḥ sarva sūtreṣu anuvṛtti artham asaṃhitatayā uccāryate
athavā ādau oṃkāra dvayam adṛṣṭa arthaḥ dṛṣṭa arthaḥ ca iti

original: ante tu pakṣadvaye 'pi adṛṣṭārtha eka evoṅkāraḥ /
analyzed: ante tu pakṣa dvaye adṛṣṭa arthaḥ ekaḥ eva oṅkāraḥ
adṛṣṭa artha tvam nāma kevalam sravaṇa viśaraṇa rūpa doṣa parihāra ārtha tvam
iti etat avyayam brahma śabda viśeṣaṇam guṇa pūrṇa tva vāci
brahma śabdaḥ u pi vidvat rūḍhyā mahā yogena ca viṣṇu vācī
atha śabdaḥ ānantarya arthaḥ
yogyatayā adhikārāt
iti sambadhyate
kartavyā iti śeṣaḥ
tathā ca atha
adhyayana śama dama ādi rūpa adhikāra anantaram atas
sva janma jñāna janya prasāda janya mokṣa ākhya phala yukta tvāt om
guṇa pūrṇasya brahmaṇaḥ
viṣṇoḥ jijñāsā
śravaṇa ādi rūpaḥ vicāraḥ kartavyaḥ iti sūtra arthaḥ
viṣṇoḥ prasādāt iti atas
śabdasya artha antaram
asya jijñāsā ādi kāryam bhavet iti vākyaśeṣeṇa anvayaḥ

original: oṃ brahmaśabdayorubhayoryaugikatve 'pi ekasya rūḍhatvena viśeṣyavācitvaṃ anyasya yaugikatvena viśeṣaṇavācitvamāśrityānvayāṅgīkārānnānyataravaiyarthyam
analyzed: om brahma śabdayoḥ ubhayoḥ yaugika tve pi ekasya rūḍha tvena viśeṣya vāci tvam anyasya yaugika tvena viśeṣaṇa vāci tvam āśritya anvaya aṅgīkārāt na anyatara vaiyarthyam
om iti etat akṣaram udgītham upāsīta tat vijijñāsasva
tat brahma iti ityādi aneka viṣaya vākya saṅgrahāya ca ubhayoḥ prayogaḥ
atha śabdaḥ maṅgala arthaḥ dhikāra āntarya arthaḥ ca
atas śabdaḥ hetvarthaḥ

original: granthādau maṅgalācaraṇasyāvaśyaṃ kartavyatvena maṅgalaprayojakatayā athaśabdaṃ vyācaṣṭe - 'atha'; iti /
analyzed: grantha ādau maṅgala ācaraṇasya avaśyam kartavya tvena maṅgala prayojaka tayā atha śabdam vyācaṣṭe atha iti
maṅgalam vighna utsāraṇa asādhāraṇa kāraṇa anuṣṭheya viṣṇu smaraṇa atha śabda uccāraṇa rūpam arthaḥ prayojanam yasya

original: tathā praśastarūpānuṣṭheyamaṅgalātmako viṣṇuḥ tadguṇo vābhidheyo yasya sa tathoktaḥ /

athaśabdasya maṅgala phalaka tvam tu
oṅkāraḥ ca athaḥ ca dvau etau brahmaṇaḥ purā
kaṇṭham bhittvā viniryātau tasmāt māṅgalikau ubhau
iti manusmṛti siddham

original: muktyarthimātrasya brahmajijñāsāyāṃ pravṛttinirasanatātparyeṇāpi prayuktasyākhaṇḍāthaśabdasya vācyamarthamāha - 'adhikāra'; iti /

ca śabdaḥ nuṣṭheya ananuṣṭheya akṣara artha vivakṣayā samuccaye

original: na kevalaṃ maṅgalaprayojakaḥ kintvānantaryābhidhāyakaśceti viṣayasamuccaye vā /

original: ye ca bhagavato 'vayavāḥ priyādayo na te pratiśarīraṃ bhinnā kintvabhinnā iti jīvasvarūpasyānandasya

original: ityudāhariṣyamāṇavacanaparyālocanayādmanandamayākhyo nārāyaṇaḥ punarnārāyaṇādirūpeṇa pañcadhā bhinnaḥ śiraḥprabhṛtyavayavātmanā tiṣṭhatīti

original: tathāpyāndamaya iti taddhitavṛttyananuguṇānandapracuraiti samāsavākyābhidhāne brāhmaṇapracuro grāma itivat ānānandasyāpi prāptestadvāraṇāya  #

original: yadyapyānandamaya iti śrutisūtrānusāreṇa prācuryasya viśeṣyatvenoktāvapi nānānandaprāptiḥṣa prākāśapracuro ravirityukte 'pi savitaryandhakāraleśāpratīteḥ

adyate tti ca tai

original: yadyapi asarvaḥ iti vākyam ātmaśabdasya svāmitvārthatvamupetya svāmitvena nimittenaikyaśrutayaḥ pravṛttā ityatra pramāṇatayodāhṛtam /

original: tathāpi svāmitvenevāntaryāmitayāpyaikyaśrutayaḥ pravṛttā ityubhayatrāpyasya pramāṇatvasambhavādubhayatrāpi pramāṇatayodāharaṇaṃ yuktam /

original: tattvapradīpakṛtāmapi svāmitvenevāntaryāmitayāpyaikyaśrutayaḥ pravṛttā ityubhayatrāpi asarvaḥ iti śrutiḥ pramāṇamityabhiprāyaḥ /

original: na caivaṃ tattadantaryāmitvenāpi tattacchabdavācyatvaṃ viṣṇorastītyāha - sarvāntaryāmikaḥ iti tattvapradīpavirodhaḥ;
analyzed: na ca evam tad tad antaryāmi tvena api tad tad śabda vācyatvam viṣṇoḥ asti iti āha sarva āntaryāmikaḥ iti tattvapradīpa virodhaḥ
atra pada samanyava abhiprāya pratīteḥ iti vācyam

original: antaryāmitvenāpītyuktyā na kevalaṃ nāmāni iti śrutibalāttattacchabdapravṛttinimittatvena tattacchabdavācyatvaṃ viṣṇoḥ,
analyzed: antaryāmi tvena api iti uktyā na kevalam nāmāni iti śruti balāt tad tad śabda pravṛtti nimitta tvena tad tad śabda vācyatvam viṣṇoḥ

original: api tu antaryāmitvenāpītyetāvanmātrapratīteḥ atra padasamanvaye tātparyānavagamāt /

original: na tvekaikasya viṣṇuvācitva iti na virodhaḥ tathā cāntaryāmitvanimittena tattvamasyādivākyagatatvamahamādipadānāṃ viṣṇuvācitve tvaṃ tvadantaryāmī  #

original: sā ca gāyatrī virṇasamāveśalakṣaṇamantrātmakachanda eva bhavet, na viṣṇuḥ /
analyzed: sā ca gāyatrī virṇa samāveśa lakṣaṇa mantra ātmaka chandaḥ eva bhavet na viṣṇuḥ

original: kutaḥ? tasmāt gāyatrīśabdasya chandasyeva rūḍhatvādvāktvābhidhānācceti yojanā /
analyzed: kutas tasmāt gāyatrī śabdasya chandasi iva rūḍha tvāt vāc tva abhidhānāt ca iti yojanā
anena gāyatrī vai idam sarvam

original: iti pūrvavākyasthagāyatrīśabdasya viṣṇvanyaparatve tata evottaravākyasthajyotiṣo viṣṇvanyatvāpattyā tata eva agnisūktagatajyotiṣo 'pi tadanyatvameva  #
analyzed: iti pūrva vākya stha gāyatrī śabdasya viṣṇu anya paratve tatas eva uttara vākya stha jyotiṣaḥ viṣṇu anya tva āpattyā tatas eva agni sūkta gata jyotiṣaḥ pi tad anya tvam eva
bhavet

original: ata evānandamayatvamapi anyasyaiva bhavenna viṣṇoriti pūrvoktākṣepeṇa etadadhikaraṇotthānātpūrveṇāsyākṣepikī saṅgatiḥ /
analyzed: atas eva ānanda maya tvam api anyasya eva bhavet na viṣṇoḥ iti pūrva ukta ākṣepeṇa etad adhikaraṇa utthānāt pūrveṇa asya ākṣepikī saṅgatiḥ
evam gāyatrī viṣayaḥ
kim chandaḥ viśeṣaḥ uta viṣṇuḥ iti sandehaḥ
tathā gāyatrī chandaḥ viśeṣaḥ eva bhavet
tad śabdasya tatra rūḍha tvāt iti sa yuktikaḥ pūrvapakṣaḥ

original: tathā tasmāt jyotirapi chanda eveti tasyaiva guhānihitatvamāndamayatvaṃ ceti pūrvapakṣaphalaṃ ca sūcitaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: tathā tasmāt jyotiḥ api chandaḥ eva iti tasya eva guhā nihita tva mānda maya tvam ca iti pūrvapakṣa phalam ca sūcitam bhavati
atra pūrvapakṣe gāyatrī ādi śabdāḥ mantra parāḥ
sarvam api vākyam tad māhātmya para tayā yojanīyam
siddhānte tu atha
ityādeḥ ayam arthaḥ bhagavat māhātmya antara ārambhe tha śabdaḥ yat
śvetadvīpa ananta āsana vaikuṇṭha gatam nārāyaṇa vāsudeva vaikuṇṭha ākhyam rūpa trayam tat atas
etasmāt vivakṣitāt buddhi sthāt divaḥ paraḥ
param tad apekṣayā ucca sthāna sthitam iti arthaḥ
jyotiḥ tejaḥ mayam evaṃbhūtam tat viśvatas pṛṣṭheṣu
pṛthivyām brahmaṇaḥ merau vaijayante ntarikṣa gam

original: tṛtīyaṃ satyaloke ca sadanaṃ trividhaṃ matam //
analyzed: tṛtīyam satya loke ca sadanam trividham matam
iti vacanāt antarikṣa ga vaijayanta meru satya loka gatebhyaḥ brahmasadanebhyaḥ krameṇa ucceṣu sarvatas pṛṣṭheṣu
antarikṣa pṛthivī svara ātmaka lokebhyaḥ krameṇa ucceṣu anuttameṣu

original: na vidyate uttamo loko yebhyasteṣu pratyavareṣviti vā /
analyzed: na vidyate uttamaḥ lokaḥ yebhyaḥ teṣu pratyavareṣu iti vā
uttameṣu svayam eva uttameṣu lokeṣu
śvetadvīpa anantāsana vaikuṇṭheṣu dīpyate prakāśate
tat dīpyamānam tejaḥ idam vāva idam khalu
idam ca kim yat idam asmin puruṣe
hṛdaye antar jyotiḥ
tad śabditam brahma asti tat tena ekībhūtam iti arthaḥ

original: yo gāyatrīnāmā gāyatrīsaṃsthaḥ strīrūpo hayaśīrṣākhyo bhagavān tadidaṃ prathamaṃ rūpamityāśayena tasya dvitīyaṃ rūpaṃ vaktuṃ gāyatrītyādivākyaṃ  #
analyzed: yaḥ gāyatrī nāmā gāyatrī saṃsthaḥ strī rūpaḥ hayaśīrṣa ākhyaḥ bhagavān tat idam prathamam rūpam iti āśayena tasya dvitīyam rūpam vaktum gāyatrī ityādi vākyam
pravṛttam
yat idam kiñca bhūtam
pūrṇam matsya ādi avatāra rūpam yat ca sarvam
sarva antar sthitam rūpam tat sarvam gāyatrī
gāyatrī nāmā bhagavān eva
vai prasiddham
tasya eva tṛtīyam rūpam āha vāc iti
gāyatrī nāmā bhagavān vāc vai
vāc nāmakaḥ viṣṇuḥ eva
kutas sya viṣṇu tvam iti atas tad lakṣaṇa yogāt iti āha vāc vai iti
idam sarvam bhūtam
prāṇi jātam vāc vai
vāc nāmaka bhagavat adhīnam eva
atas sarva svāmi tvāt vācaḥ viṣṇu tvam iti
siddhānta sūtra aṃśam anukaroti na iti
nigadyate iti atra api sambadhyate

original: tathā ca jyotiḥśabdena viṣṇureva nigadyata ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: tathā ca jyotiḥ śabdena viṣṇuḥ eva nigadyate iti arthaḥ

original: kuta ityato nigadāditi hetuṃ yojayati - hi nigadyata iti /
analyzed: kutas iti atas nigadāt iti hetum yojayati hi nigadyate iti
gāyatrī śabdena iti śeṣaḥ
tathā ca hi yasmāt gāyatrī śabdena api viṣṇuḥ eva nigadyate
abhīdhīyate tasmāt iti arthaḥ
viṣṇoḥ gāyatrī ādi śabdaiḥ abhidhānam ca na tad abheda vidhāna artham
kintu tathā upāsana artham eva iti āha tathā iti
cetaḥ arpaṇā iti ukti prayojanam pūrvavat
bhāṣya tva jñāpanāya tathā ityādi sva padāni tathāśabda artha kathanena vivṛṇoti agni iti
atra jyotiḥ śabda upalakṣaka agni padam jyotissūtrasya bhinna adhikaraṇa tva pakṣe anyatra

original: prasiddhasya gāyatrīpadasya viṣṇau prayoge prayojanamatra vadatā sūtrakṛtā pūrvatrottaratra
analyzed: prasiddhasya gāyatrī padasya viṣṇau prayoge prayojanam atra vadatā sūtra kṛtā pūrvatra uttaratra

original: cāgnyādipadasya viṣṇau prayoge prayojanaṃ sūcitamiti darśayitum /
analyzed: ca agni ādi padasya viṣṇau prayoge prayojanam sūcitam iti darśayitum

original: na ca gāyatryādipadābhyāmeva gāyatrīpadasamanvayaphalasya pūrvatrottaratra coktasamanvayaphalasya ca sūcanasambhavādagnipadaṃ vyarthamiti vācyam
analyzed: na ca gāyatrī ādi padābhyām eva gāyatrī pada samanvaya phalasya pūrvatra uttaratra ca ukta samanvaya phalasya ca sūcana sambhavāt agni padam vyartham iti vācyam
phalībhūta samanvaya viṣaya tvena asya api avaśya upādeya tvāt
samāna prakaraṇa stha vāc ādi grāhaka tvena ādi śabdasya api āvaśyaka tvāt
avaśya apekṣitābhyām ubhābhyām api ānanda maya ādi adhikaraṇeṣu uttaratra ca ukta prayojanasya api sūcana sambhavāt ubhayam api āvaśyakam
jyotiḥ ityādi catur sūtryāḥ eka adhikaraṇa tva pakṣe tu śabda dvaya upādānam
na tu phala tvena agni śabdasya adhikaraṇa antare pi etad nyāya sūcanam tu ādi śabdena eva
na tu ubhābhyām
bhinna jātīya aneka śabda grahaṇa artham śabda dvaya uttara ādi padam

original: ata eva tattvapradīpe ādiśabdasyobhayatrānvayaṃ prathamādiśabdena tejaḥśabdānāṃ dvitīyena
analyzed: atas eva tattvapradīpe ādi śabdasya ubhayatra anvayam prathama ādi śabdena tejaḥ śabdānām dvitīyena

original: chandaśśabdānāṃ ca grahaṇamabhipretya 'agnyāditejaḥśabdānāṃ gāyatryādichandaśśabdānāṃ ca'; ityuktam /
analyzed: chandaḥ śabdānām ca grahaṇam abhipretya agni ādi tejaḥ śabdānām gāyatrī ādi chandaḥ śabdānām ca iti uktam
kecid tu bhāṣya gata hi śabdaḥ jñāna artham atha dhyāna artham iti pramāṇa prasiddhi dyotakaḥ
adhikaraṇa antare pi asya nyāyasya anusandheya tva jñāpakaḥ ca iti āhuḥ
cetaḥ rpaṇa artham iti sa avadhāraṇam
tathā ca asau
bhagavān agni gāyatrī ādi śabdaiḥ agni gāyatrī ādi śabda artha guṇa svarūpaḥ iti
tatra cetaḥ rpaṇa artham
budhi avatāraṇa artham upāsana artham eva nigadyate
na tad abheda vidhāna artham iti arthaḥ
iti ityantena tathāśabda arthaḥ uktaḥ
anena aprasiddha gāyatrī ādi padena viṣṇoḥ abhidhānasya vaiyarthya śaṅkā parihṛtā
tathā hi darśanam gāyati trāyati ca
chāṃ ityādi
nanu bhavet gāyatrī ādi śabda vācyatvena viṣṇoḥ jyotiḥ śabda vācyatā sādhanam yadi iyam gāyatrī

original: viṣṇuḥ syāttadeva kuta ityato gānatrāṇakartṛtvaliṅgādityāśayena tasyāsiddhiparihārāya
analyzed: viṣṇuḥ syāt tat eva kutas iti atas gāna trāṇa kartṛ tva liṅgāt iti āśayena tasya asiddhi parihārāya
pravṛttam tathā hi iti sūtra śeṣam
anukṛtya darśana pada uktām śrutim darśayati tathā iti
hi yasmāt ityādi darśanam
śrutiḥ asti iti anvayaḥ
yadi api gāyati trāyate ca
iti pāṭhaḥ chandogānam
tathā api śākhā antaram eva idam iti adoṣaḥ

original: ādipadena 'yā vai sā gāyatrī iyaṃ vāva sā yeyaṃ pṛthivyasyāṃ hīdaṃ sarvaṃ bhūtaṃ pratiṣṭhitametāmeva nātiśīyate'; (chāṃ. 3-12.2.)
analyzed: ādi padena yā vai sā gāyatrī iyam vāva sā yā iyam pṛthivī asyām hi idam sarvam bhūtam pratiṣṭhitam etām eva na atiśīyate chām
iti ādikam gṛhyate
śruti arthaḥ tu yatas gāyatrī vācyaḥ bhagavān vedān gāyati
mukhāt nissārayati prathamaḥ vaktā iti yāvat
yasmāt ca trāyate
akhilam iti śeṣaḥ
atas gāyatrī śabdena ucyate

original: 'yā'; prasiddhā gāyatrī tannāmā viṣṇuḥ 'sā iyaṃ vai'; iyaṃ khalu /
analyzed: yā prasiddhā gāyatrī tad nāmā viṣṇuḥ sā iyam vai iyam khalu
kim iyam yā iyam pṛthivī
tad nāmā bhagavān

original: kathaṃ pṛthivī viṣṇurityataḥ tallakṣaṇayogādityāha - asyāṃ hīdamiti /
analyzed: katham pṛthivī viṣṇuḥ iti atas tad lakṣaṇa yogāt iti āha asyām hi idam iti
asyām pṛthivyām bhūtam
prāṇi jātam āśritam iti
sudhāyām tu pūrvapakṣa anuguṇa tayā gāyatrī gāyati
artham pratipādayati
adhyetṛn trāyate
pālayati pāpāt rakṣati iti arthaḥ uktaḥ
sarva chandaḥ abhidhaḥ hi eṣaḥ sarva deva abhidhaḥ hi asau
sarvaloka abhidhaḥ hi eṣaḥ teṣām tad upacārataḥ
iti vāmane

original: nanu gāyatryādiśabdasya anyatra rūḍhatvātkathaṃ liṅgamātreṇa viṣṇutvaniścaya ityato
analyzed: nanu gāyatrī ādi śabdasya anyatra rūḍha tvāt katham liṅga mātreṇa viṣṇu tva niścayaḥ iti atas

original: gāyatryādiśruteḥ sāvakāśatvāditi bhāvena gāyatryagnipṛthivyādiśabdāḥ na kevalaṃ śrutyuktayogena viṣṇau sāvakāśāḥ,
analyzed: gāyatrī ādi śruteḥ sa avakāśa tvāt iti bhāvena gāyatrī agni pṛthivī ādi śabdāḥ na kevalam śruti ukta yogena viṣṇau sa avakāśāḥ

original: api tu paurāṇikarūḍhyā gāyatryāḥ bhagavadadhīnatvādapītyāśayena tatra smṛtimāha - sarveti /
analyzed: api tu paurāṇika rūḍhyā gāyatryāḥ bhagavat adhīna tvāt api iti āśayena tatra smṛtim āha sarva iti
eṣaḥ viṣṇuḥ sarvachandaḥ bhidhaḥ
sarva chandasām abhidhā iva abhidhā yasya iti bahuvrīhiḥ
chandaḥ vācaka gāyatrī ādi sarva śabda vācyaḥ
evam asau viṣṇuḥ sarva devatā vācaka agni ādi śabda vācyaḥ
tathā eṣaḥ viṣṇuḥ sarva loka vācaka pṛthivī ādi śabda vācyaḥ iti arthaḥ

original: kuta ityataḥ chanda ādīnāṃ bhagavadadhīnatvāditi pratyekaṃ hetutrayasūcanāya hiśabdatrayaṃ,
analyzed: kutas iti atas chandaḥ ādīnām bhagavat adhīna tvāt iti pratyekam hetu traya sūcanāya hi śabda trayam
veda prasiddhi jñāpānāya vā

original: chandasāṃ lokānāṃ ca pratyakṣatvāt devānāṃ ca parokṣatvādeṣo 'sāviti vicitroktiḥ /
analyzed: chandasām lokānām ca pratyakṣa tvāt devānām ca parokṣa tvāt eṣaḥ sau iti vicitra uktiḥ

original: kathaṃ tarhyanyatra vyavahāra ityata āha - teṣāmiti /
analyzed: katham tarhi anyatra vyavahāraḥ iti atas āha teṣām iti
chandaḥ deva lokānām iti arthaḥ
tat tad śabda bodhya tvam upacārataḥ
viṣṇu samīpe caraṇāt tad adhīna tvāt amukhyatas eva iti arthaḥ
vāmanaḥ iti asya hi
yatas vāmane iti darśanam
pratipādanam asti atas śruteḥ mukhya vṛtyāḥ viṣṇau eva sāvakāśa tvāt liṅgasya amukhyataḥ pi anyatra anavakāśa tvāt tena
tad bādhā upapatteḥ bhavati eva gāna trāṇa kartṛ tva liṅga mātreṇa ayam nirṇayaḥ iti upaskareṇa anvayaḥ
bhūta ādi pāda vyapadeśa upapatteḥ ca evam

original: hetvantareṇāpi gāyatryāḥ viṣṇutvaṃ sādhayatsūtramupanyasya tadgṛhītāṃ śrutimudāharati - bhūtādīti/
analyzed: hetu antareṇa api gāyatryāḥ viṣṇu tvam sādhayat sūtram upanyasya tad gṛhītām śrutim udāharati bhūta ādi iti
iti śabdasya bhūta ādi iti anena anvayaḥ

original: sūtre bhūtaṃ viśvamādiḥ prathamoddiṣṭaṃ yeṣu te bhūtādayaḥ,
analyzed: sūtre bhūtam viśvam ādiḥ prathama uddiṣṭam yeṣu te bhūta ādayaḥ

original: te pādāḥ yasya gāyatrīpadārthasya sa bhūtādipādaḥ,
analyzed: te pādāḥ yasya gāyatrī padārthasya sa bhūta ādi pādaḥ

original: tasya vyapadeśaḥ tatpratipādakaṃ vākyaṃ tasyopapatteḥ yuktatvāditi vigrahaḥ /
analyzed: tasya vyapadeśaḥ tad pratipādakam vākyam tasya upapatteḥ yukta tvāt iti vigrahaḥ
pāda śabdaḥ bhāva pradhānaḥ
atas eva bhūta ādi pāda tvasya iti uktam ṭīkāyām
evam iti asya ca ubhayatra anvayaḥ
tathā ca pādaḥ sya sarvā bhūtāni
tri pādasya amṛtam divi
iti evam gāyatryāḥ

original: bhūtādiśabdagṛhītāmṛtākhyāṃśacatuṣṭavattvopadeśāt tasya ca viṣṇāvevopapatteranyatrānupapattereva gāyatrīśabdavācyo viṣṇureva bhavedityarthaḥ
analyzed: bhūta ādi śabda gṛhīta amṛta ākhya aṃśa catuṣṭavattva upadeśāt tasya ca viṣṇau eva upapatteḥ anyatra anupapatteḥ eva gāyatrī śabda vācyaḥ viṣṇuḥ eva bhavet iti arthaḥ

original: caśabdasya vyapadeśapadenānvaye gāyatryā viṣṇutve sādhye pūrvasūtre darśanapadoktahetoḥ etatsūtroktahetudvayasya ca samuccaye saḥ /
analyzed: caśabdasya vyapadeśa padena anvaye gāyatryāḥ viṣṇu tve sādhye pūrva sūtre darśana pada ukta hetoḥ etad sūtra ukta hetu dvayasya ca samuccaye saḥ

original: yathāśrutānvaye tu bhūtādipādatvasya viṣṇuliṅgatvaṃ na kevalaṃ viṣṇorevopapatteḥ siddham,
analyzed: yathāśruta anvaye tu bhūta ādi pāda tvasya viṣṇu liṅga tvam na kevalam viṣṇoḥ eva upapatteḥ siddham

original: kintu puruṣasūktoktatvācceti hetusamuccaye sa iti jñeyam /
analyzed: kintu puruṣasūkta ukta tvāt ca iti hetu samuccaye saḥ iti jñeyam
chāndogye hi sā eṣā catuṣpadā ṣaḍvidhā gāyatrī chā

original: iti vākyena yaiṣā ṣaḍvidhā gāyatrī sā catuṣpadetyevaṃ gāyatrīnāmakasya bhagavataḥ
analyzed: iti vākyena yā eṣā ṣaḍvidhā gāyatrī sā catuṣpadā iti evam gāyatrī nāmakasya bhagavataḥ
prāk ukta gāyatrī bhūta vāc pṛthivī śarīra hṛdaya lakṣaṇa ṣaḍvidha tvam anūdya aṃśa catuṣṭayavat tva rūpam

original: catuṣpādatvaṃ vidhāya svoktārtha eva puruṣasūktamantraḥ samākhyārūpatvenodāhṛto brāhmaṇena
analyzed: catuṣpāda tvam vidhāya sva ukta arthaḥ eva puruṣasūkta mantraḥ samākhyā rūpa tvena udāhṛtaḥ brāhmaṇena
tat etat ṛcā abhyanūktam chāṃ

ānukūlyena uktam iti arthaḥ

original: pādo 'sya sarvā bhūtāni tripādasyāmṛtaṃ divi'; (chāṃ. 3-12-6.) iti /

original: tathāpi ṭīkāyāṃ sarvāṇi bhūtānyasyaikaḥ pāda iti pādavidhānadarśanāt;
analyzed: tathā api ṭīkāyām sarvāṇi bhūtāni asya ekaḥ pādaḥ iti pāda vidhāna darśanāt
iti ukta tvāt ca

original: trayāṇāṃ pādānām aṃśānāṃ samudāyo nārāyaṇavāsudevavaikuṇṭhasaṃjñaṃ triṣu rūḍhyā dyotamānatvācca dyuśabdavācyeṣu śvetadvīpānantāsanavaikuṇṭheṣu  #
analyzed: trayāṇām pādānām aṃśānām samudāyaḥ nārāyaṇa vāsudeva vaikuṇṭha saṃjñam triṣu rūḍhyā dyotamāna tvāt ca dyu śabda vācyeṣu śvetadvīpa anantāsana vaikuṇṭheṣu
